CustomField.description: This field would be the date that a check was dated (i.e., check number returned from bank), or the date on which an EFT trace number was generated at the bank. This information will be delivered in a file that comes after the initial claim record is delivered as this date is not known at the time of approval of a claim. Rejected claims will not ever get a date assigned in this field as no check or EFT payment will be made for rejected claims. Only claims with claim outcome = A (Approved) will ever see this field populated.
CustomField.label: Payment Date
